tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I visited dentist Dr. Chitrang Thaker on 27/12/2021 with regards to a dental filling. I have a ceramic cap which came of hence I did show the cap to doctor to which he clearly said that the same cannot be recemented as the cap is of no use. Dr. Chitrang Thaker suggested I have to go for a new ceramic cap for which I have to pay 2000/- for cement filling and 6000/- for the cap. So then I got in touch with my dentist and I visited him on 28/12/2021 , ** ********** *** *** *** **** **** ** ***** *** * **** ** * ** ****** *** ***** *** ****** ** **** **** *** ******** ****** ** ********* ***** ***** *********** *********
reply_text:
Thank you for your feedback...We hope the cap stays for much more than 3 years.
You seem to have made an opinion on success of mere single day of unethical treatment given to you
The treatment suggested was as per proper dental treatment which was refilliing the tooth and making a fresh cap and not refitiing a cap with a filling inside the cap and allowing chance of re infection on a root canal treated tooth.
The dr who has done this work please ask him how many dentist wil do what he did and how many wil do what we suggested.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Visited for my tooth extraction. Firstly, I was explained whole procedure in a very detailed manner by Dr Chitrang and then I decided to go for my tooth extraction. I was literally shivering before going inside the cabin, but Dr Kalsi and Dr Chitrang made me feel very comfortable and it just got done without any pain. Dr Kalsi was courteous and proficient at his work. He did whole procedure impassively. I just had to be a bit careful with all the precautions and medication and there is no pain as such. A big thanks to their staff as well, they literally called to check whether I'm having any pain or not once I reached home. So much gratitude. üôèüèª
reply_text:
Thank you  so much for your kind words of appreciation and trust in us...it only encourages us to do better.
Regards,
Team
The Dental Studio

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Absolutely fantastic experience from start to end. My mind was completely put to rest by the team, who explained my (several) dental problems in detail and all possible options were discussed before charting the treatment course. Fantastic team of surgeons who executed that plan efficiently (and rather painlessly) . All post-op instructions were made crystal clear and regular follow-ups ensured adherence. A special shout out to the Director, Dr Chitrang Thaker for facilitating everything and making sure I felt personally attended to at every visit. I would recommend the Dental Studio to anyone considering a one stop shop for all/any of their dental problems 200%.
